name: Thraft
description:
This is a super early version of the game. Feel free to share your experience and ideas, we appreciate any feedback! Join our Discord server . . . Ride a raft, fish, and swat mosquitos in a chill, atmospheric experience.

There are three possible win conditions:

  • Explore: Reveal the entire lake
  • Exploit: Catch every one of the 9 fish types
  • Exploit: Swat 36 mosquitos

But there are also three lose conditions - Don't get hungry, don't get overwhelmed by mosquitos and don't get caught by the shark!

Length: 15-30 minutes.

Controls

[1] - Fish.
[2] - Stir.
[3] - Swat.

The Team

Asaf Arad, Dori Rosenberg, Lior Beilinson, Idan Rooze

Made as part of a game jam course in Bezalel Academy of Art and design.
